title: skilled Silver player looking for duo to climb to gold
body: I am looking for a duo to climb to gold, I am sick of solo que it's impossible to win a game when a lane just feeds ridiculously no matter how nice you are or try communicate with them they just rage quit or go afk, whenever I do duos I get good win streaks but solo que is just a horrible mess. I main jungle, but can also supp and mid.

replies.body: here lmk, silver can play all roles but adc! main support jg top
